    router.prefetch

    router.beforePopState

    ë¼ìš°í„°ê°€Â ë™ì‘í•˜ê¸°ì „ì—Â ë¬´ì–¸ê°€Â ì‘ì—…ì„Â í•˜ê³ Â ì‹¶ì„Â ë•ŒÂ ì‚¬ìš©

    • popstateÂ :Â ì‚¬ìš©ìì˜Â ì„¸ì…˜Â ê¸°ë¡Â íƒìƒ‰ìœ¼ë¡œÂ ì¸í•´Â í˜„ì¬Â í™œì„±í™”ëœÂ ê¸°ë¡Â í•­ëª©ì´Â ë°”ë€”Â ë•ŒÂ ë°œìƒâš ï¸ popstate ê´€ë ¨ ì •ë³´Â â†’Â https://developer.mozilla.org/ko/docs/Web/API/Window/popstate_event
    import { useEffect } from 'react'
import { useRouter } from 'next/router'

export default function Page() {
  const router = useRouter()

  useEffect(() => {
    router.beforePopState(({ url, as, options }) => {
      // ì•„ë˜ ë‘ urlë¡œë§Œ ì´ë™ì„ í—ˆìš©í•˜ê³  ì‹¶ì„ë•Œ
      if (as !== '/' && as !== '/other') {
        // Have SSR render bad routes as a 404.
        window.location.href = as
        return false
      }

      return true
    })
  }, [])

  return <p>Welcome to the page</p>
}

    router.back

    ë’¤ë¡œê°€ê¸°Â ë²„íŠ¼Â í´ë¦­ê³¼Â ê°™ìŒ

    window.history.back()Â Â ì‹¤í–‰

    import { useRouter } from 'next/router'

export default function Page() {
  const router = useRouter()

  return (
    <button type="button" onClick={() => router.back()}>
      Click here to go back
    </button>
  )
}

    next/routerë¡œÂ ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ë¥¼Â ê°ì§€í•´ì„œÂ íŠ¹ì •Â ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ê°€Â ë°œìƒí•˜ë©´Â í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼Â ì‹¤í–‰

    1. routeChangeStart

    routeChangeStart(url, { shallow })Â Â ê²½ë¡œê°€ ë³€ê²½ë˜ê¸° ì‹œì‘í• ë•Œ ë°œìƒ

    2. routeChangeComplete

    routeChangeComplete(url, { shallow })Â Â ê²½ë¡œê°€ ì™„ì „íˆ ë³€ê²½ë˜ë©´ ë°œìƒ

    3.Â routeChangeError

    routeChangeError(url, { shallow })Â Â ê²½ë¡œ ë³€ê²½ì‹œ ì˜¤ë¥˜ê°€ ë°œìƒí•˜ê±°ë‚˜ ê²½ë¡œ ì „í™˜ ì·¨ì†Œì‹œ ë°œìƒ (err.cancelled - íƒìƒ‰ì´ ì·¨ì†Œë˜ì—ˆëŠ”ì§€ ì—¬ë¶€)

    4.Â beforeHistoryChange

    beforeHistoryChange(url, { shallow })Â Â ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì˜ historyë¥¼ ë³€ê²½í•˜ê¸° ì „ì— ë°œìƒ

    5.Â hashChangeStart

    hashChangeStart(url, { shallow })Â Â í•´ì‹œëŠ” ë³€ê²½ë˜ì§€ë§Œ í˜ì´ì§€ëŠ” ë³€ê²½ë˜ì§€ ì•Šì„ë•Œ ë°œìƒ

    6.Â hashChangeComplete

    hashChangeComplete(url, { shallow })Â Â í•´ì‹œê°€ ë³€ê²½ë˜ì—ˆì§€ë§Œ í˜ì´ì§€ëŠ” ë³€ê²½ë˜ì§€ ì•Šì„ë•Œ ë°œìƒ

    import { useEffect } from 'react'
import { useRouter } from 'next/router'

export default function MyApp({ Component, pageProps }) {
  const router = useRouter()

  useEffect(() => {
    const handleRouteChange = (url, { shallow }) => {
      console.log(
        `App is changing to ${url} ${
          shallow ? 'with' : 'without'
        } shallow routing`
      )
    }

    router.events.on('ë¼ìš°í„°ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì´ë¦„ ex) routeChangeStart' handleRouteChange)

    // If the component is unmounted, unsubscribe
    // from the event with the `off` method:
    return () => {
      router.events.off('ë¼ìš°í„°ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì´ë¦„ ex) routeChangeStart' handleRouteChange)
    }
  }, [])

  return <Component {...pageProps} />
}

    withRouter

    ë¼ìš°í„°ì— ì˜í•´ì„œ í˜¸ì¶œëœ ì»´í¬ë„ŒíŠ¸ê°€ ì•„ë‹ˆì–´ë„ match, location, history ê°ì²´ì— ì ‘ê·¼í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ í•´ì¤€ë‹¤.

    import { withRouter } from 'next/router'

function Page({ router }) {
  return <p>{router.pathname}</p>
}

export default withRouter(Page)

    +Â widthRouterÂ >Â useÂ TypeScript

    import React from 'react'
import { withRouter, NextRouter } from 'next/router'

interface WithRouterProps {
  router: NextRouter
}

interface MyComponentProps extends WithRouterProps {}

class MyComponent extends React.Component<MyComponentProps> {
  render() {
    return <p>{this.props.router.pathname}</p>
  }
}

export default withRouter(MyComponent)
